title: Stage S16
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Yes, of course.
No, thank you.
Sure, no problem.
Maybe next time.
Absolutely! That sounds great.
I'm not sure about that.
Sounds good to me.
Let me think about it.
That's a good idea.
I'd love to, but I'm busy.
Yes, of course.
No, thank you.
Sure, no problem.
Maybe next time.
Absolutely! That sounds great.
I'm not sure about that.
Sounds good to me.
Let me think about it.
That's a good idea.
I'd love to, but I'm busy.
I think this is a good idea.
In my opinion, we need more time.

sentences.kr: 저는 열심히 일하면 보상이 따른다고 믿어요.
sentences.en: I believe that hard work pays off.
I feel that we should wait a little longer.
What do you think about this plan?
I personally think that it's too expensive.
From my point of view, this is the best option.

sentences.kr: 다른 방법을 시도해볼 수 있을 것 같아요.
sentences.en: I suppose we could try a different approach.

sentences.kr: 제가 보기에는 그가 관심이 없는 것 같아요.
sentences.en: It seems to me that he's not interested.

sentences.kr: 제가 생각하기에는 가격보다 품질이 더 중요해요.
sentences.en: As far as I'm concerned, quality is more important than price.
I think this is a good idea.
In my opinion, we need more time.
